immediateTransferAd.title: Your transfer in less than 10 seconds
immediateTransferAd.content: Need to send money to friends or family quickly? Find in your beneficiaries who is eligible to instant payment and send them money in less than 10 seconds.

passkeysAd.title: More security with Passkeys
passkeysAd.content1: Passkeys offer the convenience of fast and easy authentication, and provides a security stronger than a password combined with an SMS code.
passkeysAd.content2: Even better, with passkeys, no application is required.
